Why choose the FUNds Forecast model?

Future Focused

Sick of logging past transactions? So are we. Review where you want to go, not where you’ve been.

Streamlined Design

Actions matter, not visuals. We minimize distracting, redundant graphics to show you only what you need.

Old-School Secure

Instead of giving your sensitive financial data to a third party, put it into an Excel—and you decide where is safe to save it.

Ready to get started?

Follow these steps:

  • 1. Download the zip file with the button below.
  • 2. Extract the TEMPLATE and EXAMPLE files.
    • The EXAMPLE file includes sample inputs and callouts.
    • The TEMPLATE file is completely blank for your inputs.
  • 3. Open in Excel.
  • 4. Rename the TEMPLATE, but keep the version number in the file path.
  • 5. Update regularly to stay on track!
